name: mikeyeldey: the album for Sega Genesis
name_original: mikeyeldey: the album for Sega Genesis
description:
The 2020 album "mikeyeldey: the album" will be available on May 7, 2021 as an interactive experience for the Sega Genesis.

Features:

  • All 16 songs from "mikeyeldey the album"
  • 6 exclusive bonus tracks
  • 4 minigames, located at tracks 03, 06, 11, and 13
    • Hop! 55: Fast-paced platform hopping
    • Unregistered Hypercam2: A rhythm game
    • Factory: Drop the claw hand at the right time
    • Carpeted Hospital: Guide the balloon through hoops
  • Visualizer for track 15
  • Functional on-screen fidget spinner 

The ROM file should work on any Sega Genesis emulator on PC, mobile, or where ever you enjoy retro gaming. 

Physical cartridge available here

Pink cartridge coming this summer!
